mapper.select: select commute.atte_no as atteNo , commute.stf_no as stfNo , commute.atte_yn as atteYn , commute.atte_time as atteTime , commute.leaved_time as leavedTime , DATE_FORMAT(commute.create_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as createDt , DATE_FORMAT(commute.update_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as updateDt , DATE_FORMAT(commute.delete_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as deleteDt from commute left join (select * from staff where delete_dt is null) as stf on commute.stf_no = stf.stf_no where stf.delete_dt is null AND DATE_FORMAT(commute.create_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN '2021-12-21' AND DATE_ADD('2022-12-21', INTERVAL 1 WEEK) ORDER BY createDt,stfNo;

select com.atte_no as atteNo, com.stf_no as stfNo, com.atte_yn as atteYn, com.atte_time as atteTime, com.leaved_time as leavedTime, DATE_FORMAT(com.create_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as createDt, DATE_FORMAT(com.update_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as updateDt, DATE_FORMAT(com.delete_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as deleteDt from commute com left join staff stf on com.stf_no = stf.stf_no where com.delete_dt is null

select com.atte_no as atteNo, com.stf_no as stfNo, com.atte_yn as atteYn, DATE_FORMAT(com.atte_time, '%T') as atteTime, DATE_FORMAT(com.leaved_time, '%T') as leavedTime, DATE_FORMAT(com.create_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as createDt, DATE_FORMAT(com.update_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as updateDt, DATE_FORMAT(com.delete_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as deleteDt from commute com left join staff stf on com.stf_no = stf.stf_no where com.delete_dt is null and DATE_FORMAT(com.create_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date}

select com.atte_no as atteNo, com.stf_no as stfNo, com.atte_yn as atteYn, DATE_FORMAT(com.atte_time, '%T') as atteTime, DATE_FORMAT(com.leaved_time, '%T') as leavedTime, DATE_FORMAT(com.create_dt, '%Y-%m') as createDt, DATE_FORMAT(com.update_dt, '%Y-%m') as updateDt, DATE_FORMAT(com.delete_dt, '%Y-%m') as deleteDt from commute com left join staff stf on com.stf_no = stf.stf_no where com.delete_dt is null and DATE_FORMAT(com.create_dt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m')//
